Description: Fragment of foot and lower wall of Attic black-glazed pottery cup; glazed black on interior and exterior; reserved: outer face of foot, resting surface and underside; light groove around top of outer edge of foot; incised inscription on underside. Castulo cup.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 547)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1668)
